src.GUI

Class GameScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.BasicGame
      • src.GUI.GameScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.newdawn.slick.ControlledInputReciever, org.newdawn.slick.ControllerListener, org.newdawn.slick.Game, org.newdawn.slick.InputListener, org.newdawn.slick.KeyListener, org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener

    public class GameScreen
extends org.newdawn.slick.BasicGame
    The main class for the main game. This handles the initialisation of all game objects and then handles all updates and rendering to the screen.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.newdawn.slick.BasicGame

        controllerButton, controllerDown, controllerLeft, controllerRight, controllerUp

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc)
          throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Initialise all of the game resources and game objects. This method runs automatically when the game is initialised because of the Slick2D library.
        Specified by:
        init in interface org.newdawn.slick.Game
        Specified by:
        init in class org.newdawn.slick.BasicGame
        Parameters:
        gc - The GameContainer that this game is contained in
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException - Slick2D couldn't start the game.

      • update

        public void update(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc,
                   int i)
            throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        The method that updates all of the systems in the game. This should run about 120 times every second. Thanks to Slick2D, this runs every tick and then the render method runs.
        Specified by:
        update in interface org.newdawn.slick.Game
        Specified by:
        update in class org.newdawn.slick.BasicGame
        Parameters:
        gc - The GameContainer containing the current game
        i - The time since the last update (I think)
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException - Slick2D could not update the game systems

      • render

        public void render(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc,
                   org.newdawn.slick.Graphics grphcs)
            throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Renders all of the graphics onto the screen. This runs straight after the update method runs thanks to Slick2D
        Parameters:
        gc - The GameContainer that contains the current game
        grphcs - The Graphics object where the images are drawn onto
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException - Slick2D could not render as something went wrong
